channel.title: software-engineering on Jonathan Loscalzo
channel.description: Recent content in software-engineering on Jonathan Loscalzo

item.title: Diverse Topics of Machine Learning
item.description: I am going to gather diverse topics of ML, but I won’t discuss none of them. I gathered them because these are not technical topics per se, are more related to theory or part of the ecosystem. General: Machine Learning from Wikipedia AI transform playbook AI Literacy What is AI Literacy? Competencies and Design Considerations and video AI Literacy 101 MLOps MLOps: automation pipelines and CD in AI Hidden Technical Debt in ML Systems and here Automating the end-to-end lifecycle of Machine Learning applications - M.
